body: Hey Mike, I just finished implementing this and you can find a psych chart with IP functionality in the attached GH file.  To trigger the IP capability, all that you have to do is connect temperature values that are in degrees Fahrenheit (and include an "F" in the stream of connected temperature data). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/*4sM22xZ7yt7RcmFv3V0ir*kZW-QyvpVK3xvlCRc10Lv1OeEd9HzVDDqBCSXqZMq82ZN5-8ujVRbshe4qz2zRcMXk5Mr7Jn0/IPPsychChart.JPG) -Chris
